::Perndabot/Grimmler::

Perndabot growls at Biomass. He didn't appreciate anyone but Zardus 
ordering him around.

"We'll go see him when I say we do." He says, an autogun swirling 
slightly, having all three of the bots there in its sights for a 
second, as if to reinforce Perndabot's words, though it was just doing 
a routine sweep.

He looks at Swyft. If the femm responded, he would take her to Zardus 
as well. If not, he would just take these two.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> * Biomass lifted a brow as Perndabot answered him, thinking that 
this bot 
> was obviously some kind of dolt compaired to the rest of his crew, 
even 
> they, he could bet, knew more about this ship and their commander 
then he 
> did.
> Biomass stepped closer to Perndabot.*
> 
> " Then take us to him."
> 
> * Biomass was pushing his luck with a big bot like Perndabot, but he 
wanted 
> to know just how far he could take this guy before he got 
aggressive.
> Biomass wasn't a small bot and he was only 5 ft smaller then this 
one, a 
> fight could be interesting but for the moment he was trying to place 
his 
> authority as quickly as he could in this faction.*
> 
> * Nue'e looked at Biomass with a look that told him not to push his 
luck.*
> 
> .......................................
> 
> * Tremmer, being blind, doesn't see Grimmler motion for him to 
follow but 
> his nose picked up the scent of the Maximal moving away and decides 
to 
> follow all the same. Moving to four legs he starts moving towards 
him, his 
> nose always to the ground to make sure that he could smell if 
something was 
> ahead of him so he wouldn't run into it.*
> 
> " Maximals ain't ever had it easy, kid."
> 
> * Tremmer walked up so that he was right along side Grimmler.*
> 
> " Never will. Just gotta take it as it is."
> 
> 
> 
>
